sdata.e: I learned about your portable copier at the Tokyo-Office '97 Expo.

sdata.e: As a rule, he arrives at the office at about nine-thirty in the morning.

sdata.e: I have installed Microsoft Office on my personal computer, so please use its file format when you send me the attachment.

sdata.e: The boss called Jim into his office and gave him his pink slip.

sdata.e: Nixon was caught lying because he bugged his own office.
